code: import React,{useState,Fragment}from"react";import MetaData from"../layout/MetaData";import"./Search.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Search=_ref=>{let{history}=_ref;const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState("");const searchSubmitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(keyword.trim()){history.push("/products/".concat(keyword));}else{history.push("/products");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MetaData,{title:"Search A Product -- ECOMMERCE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"searchBox",onSubmit:searchSubmitHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search a Product ...",onChange:e=>setKeyword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Search"})]})]});};export default Search;
